name: Weightless (Grizmu, Rondaar, kamilcoolas)
description:
The Weight of the world have been unbalanced, everything started to be weightless and drift away into nothingness. You are the only hope to bring balance back, but it will not be easy, cause Creatures of Weightlessness are there to stop you. Collect coins and try to survive as long as you can.

Loading-100 Team:

  • Coolas - Level/Game Design
  • Sir Victor - Development
  • Sir Rondar - Development / 3D Graphics /  VFX
  • Sir Grizmu - Development / Audio
